title: Bump elliptic from 6.4.1 to 6.5.3 in /themes

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

labels.name: javascript
labels.description: Pull requests that update Javascript code

body:
Bumps [elliptic](https://github.com/indutny/elliptic) from 6.4.1 to 6.5.3.
Commits
  • 8647803 6.5.3
  • 856fe4d signature: prevent malleability and overflows
  • 6048941 6.5.2
  • 9984964 package: bump dependencies
  • ec735ed utils: leak less information in getNAF()
  • 71e4e8e 6.5.1
  • 7ec66ff short: add infinity check before multiplying
  • ee7970b travis: really move on
  • 637d021 travis: move on
  • 5ed0bab package: update deps
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=elliptic&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=6.4.1&new-version=6.5.3)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/configuring-github-dependabot-security-updates) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot use these labels` will set the current labels as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use these reviewers` will set the current reviewers as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use these assignees` will set the current assignees as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use this milestone` will set the current milestone as the default for future PRs for this repo and language You can disable automated security fix PRs for this repo from the [Security Alerts page](https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/network/alerts).
--- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/prestashop/prestashop/20811)

title: Update to check Language association to the current store
body: This change force PrestaShop to check if the id_lang from the Prestashop cookie is available in the current store, if not available and associated then the default language is selected. | Questions | Answers | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | Branch? | develop | Description? | This PR validate the loaded id_lang from the cookie and verify if the loaded language is available in the shop, if not associated then the default language for the store is selected | Type? | bug fix | Category? | FO | BC breaks? | no | Deprecations? | no | Fixed ticket? | Fixes #20807. | How to test? | To verify you need to create two shops under the same group and use the same domain with a virtual url for each one, assign a different language for each store and only associate one language to each one, then switch between stores and you can see the language is set incorrectly, to verify the language you need to dump($context->language) in config.inc.php line 200. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/prestashop/prestashop/20809)

This enables use to add a confirmation modal when deleting a row from a grid. Customers > View > Discounts. | Type? | improvement | Category? | BO | BC breaks? | no | Deprecations? | no | Fixed ticket? | Partially Fixes #17847 | How to test? | Go to Customers > View > Discounts in the BO, Try to delete a row, you will have a bootstrap modal to confirm deletion This may have impact on automated tests @PrestaShop/qa-automation --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/prestashop/prestashop/20799)

title: Add check for visitor's country
body: The visitor's country needs to be checked before the default country is used in the event that Geolocation is on. This then selects the proper carriers for the visitors country and properly displays them in the shopping according to the options set in Shipping->preferences. iso_code_country is used to create the country_id for the visitor because the visitor's cookie does not contain id_country. This is related to https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/pull/13517. | Questions | Answers | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | Branch? | develop | Description? | The visitor's country needs to be checked before the default country is used in the event that Geolocation is on. Related to #13517. | Type? | improvement | Category? | FO | BC breaks? | no | Deprecations? | no --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/prestashop/prestashop/20789)

title: WIP: Improve multi invoices shipping, discounts and computing
body:
| Questions | Answers | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | Branch? | 1.7.7.x | Description? | When an order had several invoices, the shipping used to be handled only on first invoice The next ones had necessarily 0 this was hard coded but resulted in many inconsistent behaviours Now each invoice has independent shipping and discount management and Order is the addition of all sub invoices This leads to more consistent values, but there is still the possibility to have new invoices with shipping discount (which works more logically now as well) A few behat scenarii have been added to validate all these behaviours
It also fixes the edition of an OrderDetail's invoice, and then updates all invoices accordingly, along with checking that it doesn't create duplicate entries in an invoice (error message has been improved when dealing with invoices) | Type? | bug fix | Category? | BO | BC breaks? | no | Deprecations? | no | Fixed ticket? | Fixes #20409 #20778 #20612 and #18721. | How to test? | Modify an order so that it contains several invoices, each invoice should have its own shipping cost and the Order reflects it in its summary (addition of all subtotals are consistent). Also you can add discount to specific invoice, and modify an OrderDetail's invoice --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/prestashop/prestashop/20776) NOTE: this PR is blocked for now, as suggested by @eternoendless I will try to implement multi-cart to manage orders with multi-invoices

title: Bug searching for alias table into no_quotes array
body: The no_quotes array contains the execution of the AbstractProcessor::revokeQuotation function from the PHPSQLParser composer package. This function returns an array where it is included all the parts, not a string, this is why it is required to navigate also to the parts array and get the first index. | Questions | Answers | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | Branch? | 1.7.7.x | Description? | The no_quotes array contains the execution of the AbstractProcessor::revokeQuotation function from the PHPSQLParser composer package. This function returns an array where it is included all the parts, not a string, this is why it is required to navigate also to the parts array and get the first index. | Type? | bug fix | Category? | BO | BC breaks? | maybe | Deprecations? | no | Fixed ticket? | Fixes #20750 | How to test? | Go to Backend - Advanced settings - Data Base Add any query with joins --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/prestashop/prestashop/20751)

Must be work on a legacy admin page, migrated page and on the frontend --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/prestashop/prestashop/20673)

title: Refactor Tax calculation with VAT numbers
body:
Previously, the check for the vatnumbers module was done in several different places. This change adds a single method on the Tax class that deteremines the following criteria: - Is the VAT number specified? - Is VAT management even enabled? - Is the VAT from another country than the merchant? This refactor has two main benefits: - Code is clearer and more readable, and the concern of the VAT is in the Tax class, where it belongs; - Now this is trivially overriddable, for example it allows to perform a VIES check on the fly if necessary, and not only on data-entry. | Questions | Answers | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | Branch? | develop | Description? | Previously, the check for the vatnumbers module was done in several different places. This change adds a single method on the Tax class that deteremines the following criteria: Is the VAT number specified? Is VAT management even enabled? Is the VAT from another country than the merchant? This refactor has two main benefits: Code is clearer and more readable, and the concern of the VAT is in the Tax class, where it belongs; Now this is trivially overriddable, for example it allows to perform a VIES check on the fly if necessary, and not only on data-entry. | Type? | refacto | Category? | CO | BC breaks? | no | Deprecations? | no | Fixed ticket? | n/a | How to test? | - Create a customer with 3 billing addresses, one with a correct vat, one with a bad vat, one without a vatnumber.
- Install the vatnumber module and activate it;
- make sure it works as expected before and after this change: both the addresses with vat numbers should exempt you from taxes, while the one without vat should charge you taxes. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/prestashop/prestashop/20655)
